reviewText: The concert is really awsome. It is a pity that it was not recorded in a good high definition.

if nothing else will, this amazing dvd will captivate anyone watching and listening to one of brazil's foremost, young talents in the field of music, gathering new fans with every concert appearance, even outside her country. let's celebrate her success!

i agree 100% with the previous review, THIS LADY SINGS .

I only regret that although I would always see her name popping up while browsing more MPB ( Marisa Monte specially) her name would always come up, and that was several years a go but never took a minute to listen to her, WAS I WRONG.

I was not until watching the DVD  "Elas cantan Roberto" that I got to listen and see this POWERFUL VOICE and was HOOKED the very minute , interestingly among the 15 plus female artist singing Roberto Carlos songs , this one was the most cheered while singing solo and with the rest of the stars ALL WITH ROBERTO CARLOS  , WOW !!!!.

Buy It, it is also cheap, but with this quality of music , voice , songs , thats just an add on, excellente songs from a marvelous singer.

get it

If you like Ana Carolina
If you like MPB
If you like Brazilian music
or yet if you like music at all
this is the DVD to have.
Very powerful songs with excellent video and audio quality
This is one of my favorites music DVD ever
Don't miss it.
